text: Badarpur is a village in Budaun Tehsil and Budaun district, Uttar Pradesh, India. As per constitution of India and Panchyati Raaj Act Badarpur village is administrated by Gram panchayat. Badarpur is 7 kilometers away from Badaun City. There are 130 houses in Badarpur village. ==See also== * List of villages in India * Budaun district * Aam Ganv == References == Category:Villages in Budaun district
title: Badarpur, Budaun
